content.label:
I‚Äôm usually pretty wary when it comes to kalimba apps but I was having some kalimba withdrawal when I don‚Äôt have my physical kalimba with me. It‚Äôs super cute and the sound is so clear, I love the little face for the hole of the ‚Äúkeylimba‚Äù. 

Thank you so much for fixing my kalimba withdrawal and making this app ‚ù§Ô∏èüíï
This is seriously something anyone should consider downloading!
This one is so relaxing and cute. I like how you can customize it.

I never write app reviews but had to this time... thanks for making this app!! Especially free and no ads. I recently bought a kalimba and would love to use this app as a way to practice without annoying my fellow residents too much and to preserve my thumbs! One thing that would make it perfect for me ‚Äî I‚Äôd like to third the suggestion of having the ability to tune individual tines up or down as this would be more accurate to a real kalimba than tuning all the tines to a certain key üôÇ Otherwise, I can see this app as being an excellent motivator for me to practice my kalimba!

Update: the new addition of individual tine tuning works great for me! Thanks for the revision!!

The new update (tuning individual notes, up to 21 notes) is spectacular! Can you please increase the notes a bit more (if only on landscape mode), as then the app will become much more capable that the real instrument!!

This app is great, the sound feels so natural and real. It would be even greater if the option of selecting notes is added, instead of being restricted to the notes of specific keys. Still five stars though üëçüèæ.

I have downloaded this app for what 1 hour and I already learned a song !I learned play date by Melanie Martinez it‚Äôs so easy to use !you can tap on the circle on your left to record something on loop so you can play over that melody you just played !you tap on the three little bars to tune and to switch from number labels to letter labels and add more tines you can also chose a color to costumize over all 10/10 love it !
I downloaded many Kalimantan app but they don‚Äôt even COMPARE. Love it sm thank you!!

I usually never write reviews but I just felt that this app deserved it. I have been trying to learn Kalimba for some time now and this app just came to me in a surprise. This app has a simple layout making it easy to use for all ages and also it has perfect sound making it sound like a real kalimba. Thanks for making this app!

I‚Äôve only had this app for about an hour and I‚Äôve already learned my first song (a short version of Bubblegum KK). I downloaded it because I‚Äôm trying to see if I‚Äôm ready to buy a real kalimba. I‚Äôve never played one but I‚Äôve been wanting to learn and this app has definitely been already helping! I do wish I didn‚Äôt have to turn my ringer on to play but that‚Äôs just me being picky. Overall, I‚Äôm very happy!

I‚Äôve been trying to learn how to play the kalimba and see if it‚Äôs worth getting one (a 20-50$ instrument). I‚Äôve never learned how to play anything before and this app is so amazing!! It‚Äôs perfect to get the first taste of the beautiful sound of kalimba, although it doesn‚Äôt sound exactly the same but since it‚Äôs not the physical instrument in front of you, this makes sense. This is perfect for beginners, people who wanna play/practice on the go and people on the fence about getting into it or starting a new hobby such as this. This can also be used to introduce children to the instrument, which is always fun. My first kalimba will be here next week and I‚Äôm very excited! It‚Äôs on the cheaper end, as it‚Äôs my first but 100% this app helped me decide to get it at all.
This app is so cute and helpful to beginner kalimba players >///< I really do recommend this app if you can‚Äôt afford a kalimba.
The app over all is amazing but for some reason when i take out my earbuds the sound doesnt work?

I can‚Äôt get a kalimba so I had to do it on my phone and this is app is perfect there is no adds no pay an hourly subscription to really be able to use the whole app it is really fun and simple even if you aren‚Äôt interested in getting a kalimba you should still get it

I personally play piano and this is a Tiny bit similar. I love the simplicity, the small face character, the customization ability, and the sounds. I love the app in general and if you‚Äôre planning on downloading this app I highly recommend.

I love this app, my cousin gets occupied by it easily, I don‚Äôt have any complaints. A suggestion, though, is to dress up the little circle :D
My friends love it when I send them vids of me playing music! They won‚Äôt stop asking, and it‚Äôs great! They request songs and I play! I also like making my own songs.

Overall, I LOVE it and nothing major should be changed.

I downloaded this app out of boredom & it did not disappoint! It‚Äôs very simple to use. It‚Äôs also very easy to learn songs! I learned 2 songs in 2 days but you could definitely learn more than that. (I only practiced for about 5-10 minutes per day) Probably a great app for someone who isn‚Äôt sure if they want to get a Kalimba for a sort of test round? Overall amazing app, great quality, loads of fun.

This is actually perfect!!! I‚Äôve never used a Kalimba, so I am purely using this app and I love it! It sounds like a real Kalimba and it does exactly what it‚Äôs supposed to do. There are many apps where they try to make it like a game, but this app is perfect, and really easy to use.

Since I don‚Äôt have a kalimba, I searched on the App Store for a kalimba app and this first popped up. It was so cool! 
The little face is adorable!
You can choose the number of tines!
You can easily change the key!
You can change the color!
You can add or remove markings!
You can record yourself playing! 
This app is relaxing!
I just love this app. It‚Äôs the perfect substitute for people who don‚Äôt have or cannot buy a kalimba <3

title.label: Amazing and simple kalimba app! But...

content.label: This is an AMAZING kalimba app and I love it so much with its quality sound and clear interface. The only thing I would absolutely love to do is to be able to tune each key to a flat or sharp. I haven‚Äôt been able to play some of my songs because of this and since the sounds are already in the app because of the tuning feature, I think that being able to tune each key would be absolutely lovely!
This game is amazing! The little smiley face is adorable and the sound of the Kalimba is beautiful!

I love, LOVE the design of this! It's so simple yet elegant. The fact that the colors, the tines, the labels are all customizable is such a big plus! I've used this to practice some songs when I'm away from my physical kalimba and its such a big help. The smiley face is my favorite and everything just comes together for a relaxing and amazing app to use. The recording feature is so cool but I have yet to figure out when to use it myself. Thank you so much for this :) üíõ

title.label: Thanks for keeping it simple (so rare these days)!!

content.label:
Tried several kalimba apps, most of them are made to be like a video game and IMO loses the relaxing spirit of this simple and beautiful instrument...  But this one is JUST RIGHT.  Love the clean interface.  What‚Äôs more, the sound is really good and the playing experience is pretty realistic.

Since this app has the feel of a real instrument, I‚Äôd really like to have some additional ting configurations that are less common, such as the 21-note kalimba (I‚Äôve often wanted to reach just a few notes lower than C4 to play certain songs), or the ‚Äúlotus‚Äù tuning which I‚Äôm also curious about.
This app is so adorable I love it ‚ù§Ô∏è
